channel.title: Horvik
channel.description: In Varrock there is a guy called Horvik, he is were u smith, In RS u can buy platebodies & suttf like that from him, BUT IN THE GAME IM MAKIN... HE CANT SELL ANYTHING! & IDK HOW TO MAKE HIM SELL. so how do i control what he is selling??? & no is not in the Shops, thing. i cheked...
